mapper.select: SELECT mNO, ID, PASSWORD, ROLE, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, HOBBY, KAKAOTOKEN, STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM MEMBER
SELECT mNO, ID, PASSWORD, ROLE, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, HOBBY, KAKAOTOKEN, STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MNO = #{mno}
SELECT mNO, ID, PASSWORD, ROLE, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, HOBBY, KAKAOTOKEN, STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND STATUS ='Y'
SELECT mNO, ID, PASSWORD, ROLE, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, HOBBY, KAKAOTOKEN, STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE KAKAOTOKEN = #{kakaoToKen} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( mNO, ID, PASSWORD, ROLE, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, HOBBY, KAKAOTOKEN, STATUS, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES( 0, #{id}, #{password}, DEFAULT, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{hobby}, #{kakaoToken}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, ADDRESS = #{address}, HOBBY = #{hobby}, MODIFY_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE mNO = #{mno}
